data.lyric:
[ti:my ex's best friend (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly/blackbear]
[al:my ex's best friend (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]my ex's best friend (Explicit) - Machine Gun Kelly (机关枪凯利)/blackbear
[00:00.07]Lyrics by：Travis Barker/Nick Long/Colson Baker/Matthew Musto
[00:00.14]Composed by：Travis Barker/Nick Long/Colson Baker/Matthew Musto
[00:00.21]Machine Gun Kelly/blackbear：
[00:00.74]Ayy
[00:01.33]You know my ex so that makes it all feel complicated yeah
[00:05.70]
[00:06.46]It all seems complicated
[00:09.15]I read those texts that you sent to yours
[00:11.68]But I'll never say it yeah
[00:13.94]I'll never say
[00:15.25]Machine Gun Kelly：
[00:15.74]You walked in my life at 2 AM
[00:18.93]'Cause my boys knew girl that's your best friend
[00:22.44]
[00:22.97]Act like you don't see me won't play pretend
[00:26.62]Your eyes already told me what you never said
[00:30.67]Now we're in the backseat of the black car goin' home
[00:35.12]When she ask me "Is it wrong if I come up with you"
[00:39.05]We're both drunk on the elevator
[00:41.72]When I kissed you for the first time in New York City uh
[00:47.39]Machine Gun Kelly：
[00:47.91]I swear to God I never fall in love
[00:50.91]
[00:51.51]Then you showed up and I can't get enough of it
[00:54.43]
[00:55.44]I swear to God I never fall in love
[00:58.73]I never fall in love but I can't get enough of it
[01:02.27]Blackbear：
[01:02.37]First off I'm not sorry I won't apologize to nobody
[01:05.91]You play like I'm invisible girl don't act like you ain't saw me
[01:09.84]Last year was a mess and how I acted was beyond me
[01:13.58]But the past still revolves me you text me I ain't responding
[01:17.40]But now s**t's done changed go our separate ways
[01:25.27]But look at this damage you did to me
[01:26.90]I still want nothing to do between you and me
[01:28.76]Please don't say nothin' at all sound so true to me
[01:30.64]We don't got nothin' to say hey
[01:33.55]Machine Gun Kelly：
[01:34.11]I swear to God I never fall in love
[01:37.00]
[01:37.63]Then you showed up and I can't get enough of it
[01:40.59]
[01:41.51]I swear to God I never fall in love
[01:44.81]I never fall in love but I can't get enough of it
[01:48.10]
[01:49.19]I swear to God I never fall in love
[01:52.31]
[01:52.91]Then you showed up and I can't get enough of it
[01:55.95]
[01:56.82]I swear to God I never fall in love
[02:00.19]I never fall in love but I can't get enough of it
[02:03.54]Machine Gun Kelly/blackbear：
[02:04.24]You know my ex so that makes it all feel complicated yeah
[02:08.79]
[02:09.31]It all seems complicated
[02:12.19]I read those texts that you sent to yours
[02:14.57]But I'll never say it yeah
[02:16.73]I'll never say
data.trans:
[ti:my ex's best friend (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly/blackbear]
[al:my ex's best friend (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.07]//
[00:00.14]//
[00:00.21]//
[00:00.74]//
[00:01.33]你认识我的前任 这让我感觉五味杂陈
[00:05.70]
[00:06.46]这一切似乎复杂不已
[00:09.15]我看了你发给前任的短信
[00:11.68]可我永远不会告诉你
[00:13.94]我永远不会说的
[00:15.25]//
[00:15.74]凌晨两点 你闯进我的生命里
[00:18.93]因为我的朋友认识这个女孩 她是你的闺蜜
[00:22.44]
[00:22.97]你对我视若无睹 不愿在我面前惺惺作态
[00:26.62]你的眼神已经把你的心里话告诉了我
[00:30.67]现在我们坐在黑色车子的后座上 准备回家
[00:35.12]当她问我 我跟着你是不是做错了
[00:39.05]当我在纽约第一次吻你时
[00:41.72]我们已经在电梯里醉到不省人事
[00:47.39]//
[00:47.91]我对着上帝发誓 我从未坠入情网
[00:50.91]
[00:51.51]可你出现在我的生命里 我就对爱欲罢不能
[00:54.43]
[00:55.44]我对着上帝发誓 我从未坠入情网
[00:58.73]我从未坠入情网 可我无法满足于此
[01:02.27]//
[01:02.37]首先 我并未感到一丝歉意 我不会向任何人道歉
[01:05.91]你把我当做隐形人 女孩 别假装你没看见我
[01:09.84]过去一年糟糕透顶 我的所做所为超出我的承受范围
[01:13.58]可过去的事情萦绕在我心头 你给发短信给我 可我从不回消息
[01:17.40]如今一切都物是人非 我们分道扬镳
[01:25.27]看看你对我造成的伤害
[01:26.90]我心灰意冷 不想挽回我们之间的感情
[01:28.76]请别再对我说什么所谓的真心话
[01:30.64]我们之间已经没什么好说的了
[01:33.55]//
[01:34.11]我对着上帝发誓 我从未坠入情网
[01:37.00]
[01:37.63]可你出现在我的生命里 我就对爱欲罢不能
[01:40.59]
[01:41.51]我对着上帝发誓 我从未坠入情网
[01:44.81]我从未坠入情网 可我无法满足于此
[01:48.10]
[01:49.19]我对着上帝发誓 我从未坠入情网
[01:52.31]
[01:52.91]可你出现在我的生命里 我就对爱欲罢不能
[01:55.95]
[01:56.82]我对着上帝发誓 我从未坠入情网
[02:00.19]我从未坠入情网 可我无法满足于此
[02:03.54]//
[02:04.24]你认识我的前任 这让我感觉五味杂陈
[02:08.79]
[02:09.31]这一切似乎复杂不已
[02:12.19]我看了你发给前任的短信
[02:14.57]可我永远不会告诉你
[02:16.73]我永远不会说的
